text: Join us by lighting a candle at your window or retweeting ours today, January 19th at 5:30 p.m. ET, during the countrywide moment of remembrance at the #LincolnMemorial Reflecting Pool, Washington, D.C. #covid19 #covax #vaccine #covid #vaccine #bidenharris #inauguration #memorial https://t.co/iaFrAYaKuk
